item.title: Video Creation for Social Media Marketing - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video creator to produce a captivating video for our company, Deal & Runner. The video will serve as a promotional tool to be posted on social media platforms. Your primary goal will be to effectively market our brand and showcase our services in an engaging way. The ideal candidate should possess a creative mindset and be able to craft a compelling video that resonates with our target audience. Key skills required for this project include:

- Content Creation
- Video editing
- Storyboarding
- Graphic design
- Animation
- Strong understanding of social media platforms
- Ability to meet deadlines and work collaboratively with our marketing team.

If you are passionate about creating visually stunning videos and have a proven track record in social media marketing, we would love to hear from you.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 20:59 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Create a video trailer intro for new Youtube Channel. - Upwork
item.description:
I have several video clips that I am looking to make into a trailer-type video to show what my new YouTube channel is going to be all about.  - a new website/ channel/ and all the other platforms to showcase Orlando, Florida's top things to do and restaurants.

I would like this video to be made for YouTube but I want to publish the same video on Instagram and TikTok.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 24, 2024 20:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Social Media Recap Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
Hello talented social media video editors!

We are Secured Capital Lending, a nationwide private lender, and we are seeking a skilled social media video editor to create a recap video for the recent NLE (National Lending Experts) Conference in Los Angeles.

Our CEO, Sam Chivitchian, spoke at the NLE Leadership Forum, and we had an engaging booth that facilitated numerous connections with new and old business friends.

Project Details:

- Video Format: REEL, 9:16 aspect ratio
- Length: The recap video should be around 1 to 2 minutes long
- Style: Follow the style of our previous recap videos
- Content: About 2 hours of raw video footage and a little over 100 photos from the conference will be provided
- Platforms: LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, YT Shorts, and TikTok

What We Provide:

- Google Drive links to all raw video clips and photos
- Links to previous recap videos for reference:
+ Recap Video Captivate Conference 2023
+ Recap Video of National Lending Experts Conference 2023
+ Recap Video of Sponsoring Innovate Conference 2023

Requirements:

- Experience with editing recap videos or similar content for social media
- Ability to follow a specific editing style
- Proficiency in creating engaging and professional REEL videos
- Familiarity with video requirements and best practices for LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok

If you have the skills and creativity to bring our conference highlights to life, please apply with your portfolio showcasing similar work. This can turn into a long term gig! We make a lot of social media content!

Looking forward to seeing your talent!

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 24, 2024 20:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Video Enhancement, Instagram Reels, Audio Editing, Corporate Video, Social Media Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Advertising
Skills: Social Video Enhancement, Instagram Reels, Audio Editing, Corporate Video, Social Media Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Advertising
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
